quote: The sound of the blades on the ice in the morning is like smelling fresh coffee.

quote: When I say that human beings are just gene machines, one shouldn't put too much emphasis on the word 'just.' There is a very great deal of complication, and indeed beauty in being a gene machine.

quote: Let me be clear. I support the definition of marriage as a union between a man and a woman.

quote: Architecture is basically a container of something. I hope they will enjoy not so much the teacup, but the tea.
author: Yoshio Taniguchi

quote: I'm constantly thinking about what I'll do next. I never count on music being a career of longevity. I mean, longevity is key, and I hope that it lasts, but you just don't know, because it's not in your hands, you don't make the decision.

quote: Men of ill judgment ignore the good that lies within their hands, till they have lost it.

quote: Dictionaries are like watches, the worst is better than none and the best cannot be expected to go quite true.

quote: I came home after a year and although my profession was only hairdressing, I knew I could change it.

quote: I feel more influenced in my own work by dreams than I do by other writers' works in a way. Or by popular culture, movies - what else is there to write about than love and loss?

quote: I don't mean this in a stuck-up way, but I needed an attitude song.

quote: Any man may be in good spirits and good temper when he's well dressed. There ain't much credit in that.

quote: I hesitate to deposit money in a bank. I am afraid I shall never dare to take it out again. When you go to confession and entrust your sins to the safe-keeping of the priest, do you ever come back for them?

quote: The Internet has changed the way we communicate with each other, the way we learn about the world and the way we conduct business.
author: Ron Wyden

quote: The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.

quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.

quote: The person interested in success has to learn to view failure as a healthy, inevitable part of the process of getting to the top.

quote: Kids feel so strongly about what's going on today and what's happening to the world, and that's very inspiring. I feel more hopeful than ever before about the future.

quote: A good man would prefer to be defeated than to defeat injustice by evil means.

quote: Dating in Los Angeles can be hard, which makes it all the better when you meet a really nice guy.

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.

quote: Democrats want to use the slowdown as an excuse to do what their special interests are always begging for:higher taxes, bigger government and less trade with other nations.

quote: I guess I have always been deeply terrified to really be someone's wife since I know from life one cannot love another, ever, really.

quote: I definitely love that all these car brands are coming out with hybrid forms of every car that they have. It's very awesome because I think it does make a difference, and it doesn't hurt that you save a lot of money on gas.
author: Lucy Hale

quote: Faith is an aptitude of the spirit. It is, in fact, a talent:you must be born with it.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: At root fame is a sham. I'm not going to live forever and if I am I certainly need don't you to tell me that so that I will buy a car or a box of dried up crackers.

author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: History will point out some of the things I did wrong and some of the things I did right.

quote: I am very abnormal... But it wasn't very long ago that I wasn't so abnormal. I was very normal and headed for a lifetime of paying medical bills as proof of my normalcy.

quote: For one who reads, there is no limit to the number of lives that may be lived, for fiction, biography, and history offer an inexhaustible number of lives in many parts of the world, in all periods of time.

quote: Dependency is death to initiative, to risk-taking and opportunity. It's time to stop the spread of government dependency and fight it like the poison it is.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: When a man goes through six years training to be a doctor he will never be the same. He knows too much.

quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
author: Orson Welles

quote: I used to drink tons of caffeine. Now I make smoothies with frozen berries and Green Vibrance health powder.

quote: Through Kurt I saw the beauty of minimalism and the importance of music that's stripped down.

quote: Our business being to colonize the country, there was only one way to do it?by spreading over it all the associations and connections of family life.

quote: A sense of humor is the ability to understand a joke - and that the joke is oneself.
author: Clifton Fadiman

quote: After about the first Millennium, Italy was the cradle of Romanesque architecture, which spread throughout Europe, much of it extending the structural daring with minimal visual elaboration.

quote: Nothing else so destroys the power to stand alone as the habit of leaning upon others. If you lean, you will never be strong or original. Stand alone or bury your ambition to be somebody in the world.

quote: A woman my age is not supposed to be attractive or sexually appealing. I just get kinda tired of that.

quote: We may seem great in an employment below our worth, but we very often look little in one that is too big for us.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The components of anxiety, stress, fear, and anger do not exist independently of you in the world. They simply do not exist in the physical world, even though we talk about them as if they do.

quote: I think what's really amazing is that given the scale of the web and getting the compute power we have today, we're starting to see things that appear intelligent but actually aren't semantically intelligent.

quote: When my work gets crazy, I make sure to always have vitamins, water and proper food with me. That has helped me to lose 33 pounds.

quote: I'm not Candide, nor Dr Pangloss, but we know that faith moves mountains.
author: Daniel Libeskind

quote: I know of no more disagreeable situation than to be left feeling generally angry without anybody in particular to be angry at.

quote: Bid, then, the tender light of faith to shine By which alone the mortal heart is led Unto the thinking of the thought divine.
author: George Santayana

quote: Self-reverence, self-knowledge, self-control these three alone lead one to sovereign power.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Five or six hundred heads cut off would have assured your repose, freedom and happiness.

quote: Like the old soldier of the ballad, I now close my military career and just fade away, an old soldier who tried to do his duty as God gave him the light to see that duty. Goodbye.

quote: The process of making natural history films is to try to prevent the animal knowing you are there, so you get glimpses of a non-human world, and that is a transporting thing.

quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death. God is Jesus.

quote: You will recognize your own path when you come upon it, because you will suddenly have all the energy and imagination you will ever need.

quote: For every failure, there's an alternative course of action. You just have to find it. When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.

quote: I think the Canadian sense of humor is dryer than America's and juicier than Britain's. I think it's a cross between the two of them, really.

quote: My dad is a very quick-witted, sarcastic, dry, humorous guy, whereas my mom's very silly, and that side of the family is very musical.

quote: Go to the grocery store and buy better things. Buy quality, buy organic, buy natural, go to the farmers market. Immediately that's going to increase the quality of the food you make.

quote: A lot of my humor does come from anger. It's like, you're not gonna pull one over on me - which is pretty much my motto anyways.

quote: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.

quote: The joy of life consists in the exercise of one's energies, continual growth, constant change, the enjoyment of every new experience. To stop means simply to die. The eternal mistake of mankind is to set up an attainable ideal.

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to removethan the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: A am a great friend of public amusements, they keep people from vice.

quote: It looks good when you see someone kicking at the age of 51 with no double. It's kinda cool for people to know that past 50 we can keep flexible.

quote: We do not have a money problem in America. We have a values and priorities problem.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: You have riches and freedom here but I feel no sense of faith or direction. You have so many computers, why don't you use them in the search for love?
author: Lech Walesa

quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: On my job I end up jumping out of planes. Last week I got in an 18-wheeler and drove down a runway onto a skid track. The week before that they put me in a car and sunk me to the bottom of a lake to see if I could escape without an oxygen tank.
author: Rick Mercer

quote: The school made it very clear that women were entitled to positions of authority. That sense of entitlement allowed us to feel that we have a natural place in leadership in the world. That gave me a mental and emotional confidence.
author: Linda Vester

quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Most laws condemn the soul and pronounce sentence. The result of the law of my God is perfect. It condemns but forgives. It restores - more than abundantly - what it takes away.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: Because I don't take money, I'll go anywhere and do a benefit concert with almost any orchestra.
author: David Ogden Stiers

quote: My mom was a diabetic. Her sister was a diabetic, so I was already a candidate.
author: Angie Stone

quote: At home it's all Batman and Star Wars and they do gang up on me. Sometimes I don't want to dress up as Darth Vader or play train sets, so I'll go out for a drink with the girls.
author: Sadie Frost

quote: Authority has every reason to fear the skeptic, for authority can rarely survive in the face of doubt.
author: Vita Sackville-West

quote: I like to direct movies, but I don't like to goof around for eight years talking about it.
author: John Malkovich

quote: It seems like the chaos of this world is accelerating, but so is the beauty in the consciousness of more and more people.
author: Anthony Kiedis

quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Human beings are the only animal that thinks they change who they are simply by moving to a different place. Birds migrate, but it's not quite the same thing.
author: Doug Coupland

quote: There has never yet been a man in our history who led a life of ease whose name is worth remembering.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Human education is concerned with certain changes in the intellects, characters and behavior of men, its problems being roughly included under these four topics:Aims, materials, means and methods.
author: Edward Thorndike

quote: I must confess that my imagination refuses to see any sort of submarine doing anything but suffocating its crew and floundering at sea.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: I made my living being 20 or 30 pounds heavier than the average model. And that's where I got famous.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: The future depends entirely on what each of us does every day a movement is only people moving.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: An agent saw one of the plays I did at ACT, but my mom was like, No, she's too young. I became so annoying that a year and a half later she just couldn't stand hearing me any more!
author: Marla Sokoloff

quote: One cannot develop taste from what is of average quality but only from the very best.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Grandeur and beauty are so very opposite, that you often diminish the one as you increase the other. Variety is most akin to the latter, simplicity to the former.
author: William Shenstone

quote: There is a time in the tides of men, Which, taken at its flood, leads on to success. On the other hand, don't count on it.
author: Lawson, T.K.

quote: If you can eat 70 percent raw or introduce raw into your diet, it will help your health.
author: Carol Alt

quote: Left-wing politicians take away your liberty in the name of children and of fighting poverty, while right-wing politicians do it in the name of family values and fighting drugs. Either way, government gets bigger and you become less free.
author: Harry Browne

quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: Walmart is an amazing story of entrepreneurship and, as one of the world's most powerful brands, touches millions of lives every day.
author: Marissa Mayer

quote: A suburban mother's role is to deliver children obstetrically once, and by car forever after.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: Happiness isn't something you experience it's something you remember.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: There are a lot of good causes out there, but they can't possibly all be served by government.
author: Jesse Ventura

quote: Policies are many, Principles are few, Policies will change, Principles never do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: My feelings for Ellen overrode all of my fear about being out as a lesbian. I had to be with her, and I just figured I'd deal with the other stuff later.
author: Portia de Rossi

quote: Marriage is sacred and protected and has nothing to do with violating our civil rights.
author: Jack Kingston

quote: Anyone who saw Nagasaki would suddenly realize that they'd been kept in the dark by the United States government as to what atomic bombs can do.
author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quote: The depressing thing about tennis is that no matter how good I get, I'll never be as good as a wall.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: It's a funny thing, the less people have to live for, the less nerve they have to risk losing nothing.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: I don't care how famous a guitarist is, he ain't learned everything. There's always somewhere to go, something to mash up, but he ain't found it yet. You never learn everything on that guitar neck.
author: David Edwards

quote: I'm a sappy mom now. I didn't think I would be. I thought I'd be a cool mom who keeps everything in perspective.
author: Katherine Heigl

quote: Failure and things of this sort - you can take it one of two ways. You can either let that hurt you and really affect the way that you live your life in the future, or you can use that as an opportunity for growth.
author: Matt Emmons

quote: I've found myself at one in the morning just sitting at my desk spending an hour returning emails from the day until like two in the morning. It's ridiculous, I should be sleeping, or dreaming, or reading a novel.
author: Brit Marling

quote: I grew up being the girl who would always tune in to watch famous people talk about their careers, how they handled scandals and mega fame. I'm trying to pick up tips.
author: Rebecca Black

quote: What good is it being Marilyn Monroe? Why can't I just be an ordinary woman?
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The wise man must remember that while he is a descendant of the past, he is a parent of the future.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: The value of marriage is not that adults produce children but that children produce adults.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Exploiting people's emotions of fear, envy and anxiety is not hope, it's not change, it's partisanship. We don't need partisanship. We don't need demagoguery, we need solutions.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: When you get to my age life seems little more than one long march to and from the lavatory.
author: A. C. Benson

quote: By asking the question 'Am I happy?,' and via the answer setting out what I mean by happiness, there is a political route that can be taken, by asking another question - 'Can politics deliver happiness, and should it try?'
author: Alastair Campbell

quote: I've tried everything other than jumping out of a plane, but nothing gives you an adrenaline rush like racing a car.
author: Nigel Mansell

quote: Women are the only exploited group in history to have been idealized into powerlessness.
author: Erica Jong

quote: 15 minutes a day! Give me just this and I'll prove I can make you a new man.
author: Charles Atlas

quote: My understanding is that what was provided was general order of battle information, not operational intelligence. I certainly have no knowledge of US participation in preparing battle and strike packages and doubt strongly that that occurred.
author: Frank Carlucci

quote: A great deal of talent is lost to the world for want of a little courage. Every day sends to their graves obscure men whose timidity prevented them from making a first effort.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: We made the buttons on the screen look so good you'll want to lick them.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: One's happiness depends less on what he knows than on what he feels.
author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: The media bring our wars home, but only rarely have they been able to do it in complete freedom.
author: Bruce Jackson

quote: Heat of blood makes young people change their inclinations often, and habit makes old ones keep to theirs a great while.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I happen to be interested in watching a face age. I like faces of women aging so it makes me personally quite sad. That's a beautiful gift from God. If people don't want to see that anymore then I won't be in anymore movies.
author: Debra Winger

quote: A subject for a great poet would be God's boredom after the seventh day of creation.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Reputation is what men and women think of us character is what God and angels know of us.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Let us put theology out of religion. Theology has always sent the worst to heaven, the best to hell.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: My biggest fear ever is to be involved in a plane crash, so when that happened... well, I'm just thankful to be alive. I'm just grateful to be here at all.
author: Travis Barker

quote: We are near, very near, to an end to the eurozone crisis... The worst - in the sense of the fear of the eurozone breaking up - is over. But the best isn't there yet.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: Entertainers are there to entertain. They aren't there to teach your children the lessons that you haven't bothered to teach them at home yourself.
author: Wentworth Miller

quote: At the University of Maryland, my first year I started off planning to major in art because I was interested in theatre design, stage design or television design.
author: Jim Henson

quote: I want my movies to be audience experiences. As much as I like Michael Haneke, I'm not going to make a Haneke film. That's just not in my DNA.
author: Jason Reitman

quote: I've been very, very lucky in my career, in my life - from day one. When aspiring directors say, 'What's your advice?' first I say, 'Be born the son of a famous director. It's invaluable.'
author: Jason Reitman

quote: To fulfill a dream, to be allowed to sweat over lonely labor, to be given a chance to create, is the meat and potatoes of life. The money is the gravy.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
author: Colin Powell

quote: I have two homes in Malibu, a home in Canada that I'm building, and I just love pouring my heart out into this part of my life.
author: Pamela Anderson

quote: One of the major goals of health insurance reform is to bring down the cost.
author: Valerie Jarrett

quote: Most success springs from an obstacle or failure. I became a cartoonist largely because I failed in my goal of becoming a successful executive.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Age is not measured by years. Nature does not equally distribute energy. Some people are born old and tired while others are going strong at seventy.
author: Dorothy Thompson

quote: It took me fifteen years to discover I had no talent for writing, but I couldn't give it up because by that time I was too famous.
author: Robert Benchley

quote: My mum always told me I was precious, while my dad always told me I was worthless. I think that's a good grounding for a balanced life.
author: Alan Cumming

quote: Beware of men who cry. It's true that men who cry are sensitive to and in touch with feelings, but the only feelings they tend to be sensitive to and in touch with are their own.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: This soul, or life within us, by no means agrees with the life outside us. If one has the courage to ask her what she thinks, she is always saying the very opposite to what other people say.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Mr. Arthur Ashe, he was good. I read some of his books. He knew about everything, but he was real quiet and didn't talk much. I never met him.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: I have known a vast quantity of nonsense talked about bad men not looking you in the face. Don't trust that conventional idea. Dishonesty will stare honesty out of countenance any day in the week, if there is anything to be got by it.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: I don't let it bother me too much if someone doesn't like me. I just figure there's no accounting for taste. It's not me, it's my acting. It's like if someone doesn't like someone's food, they just don't like my acting.
author: Anna Chlumsky

quote: Love is anterior to life, posterior to death, initial of creation, and the exponent of breath.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: I like pens. My writing is so amazing there's never a need to erase.
author: Todd Barry

quote: Put your mind on the gospel. And remember - there's one God for all.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever:its loveliness increases it will never pass into nothingness.
author: John Keats

quote: I was who I was in high school in accordance with the rules of conduct for a normal person, like obeying your mom and dad. Then I got out of high school and moved out of the house, and I just started, for lack of a better term, running free.
author: Iggy Pop

quote: I see when men love women. They give them but a little of their lives. But women when they love give everything.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: His lordship may compel us to be equal upstairs, but there will never be equality in the servants hall.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: I always felt different as a kid, and the Kinks were like, 'Yeah, we're the Kinks.' Celebrate your difference don't be afraid of your sense of humor, or your personality, or who you are. It emboldened me.
author: Michael Weatherly

quote: I guess because the shows were activist in their own way - the marriage of my public activism and my career activism, you know - people understand me very well. They also understand there's a very strong bipartisan part in all of this.
author: Norman Lear

quote: Jim Carrey, a comic genius, has a harder time overcoming the public's desire for him to be funny simply because he's so good at it.
author: Ben Stiller

quote: I hope you love birds too. It is economical. It saves going to heaven.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: At home in Victoria, we have three dogs, Tosh and Lucy, they're half Blue Heelers, and then there's Torrin a little Maltese terrier. She gets more attention in the house than anyone else! Yes, I miss them a lot.
author: Chris Hemsworth

quote: Democracy is the only system that persists in asking the powers that be whether they are the powers that ought to be.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: It's not vanity to feel you have a right to be beautiful. Women are taught to feel we're not good enough, that we must live up to someone else's standards. But my aim is to cherish myself as I am.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: The big thing that everyone forgets, you're famous and on TV and everything, but I think there's something very rewarding to be able to write a song, record it, and have it turn out as you heard it in your head, or even better.
author: Phil Collen

quote: Discourage litigation. Persuade your neighbors to compromise whenever you can. As a peacemaker the lawyer has superior opportunity of being a good man. There will still be business enough.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: When my dad was badly weakened by the flu and my mom wanted to call an ambulance to take him to the emergency room, he wouldn't go unless he could shave first and change into a nice shirt and a pair of slacks.
author: Rich Lowry

quote: I've helped create over 400 jobs in the worst economy of my lifetime. That's cool.
author: Curt Schilling

quote: Fairness is not an attitude. It's a professional skill that must be developed and exercised.
author: Brit Hume

quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
author: Ralph Fiennes

quote: A great value of antiquity lies in the fact that its writings are the only ones that modern men still read with exactness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: So the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund is out there preserving and fighting for, and sometimes winning and sometimes losing, the fight for First Amendment rights in comics and, more generally, for freedom of speech.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Britain, relative to the U.S., is a highly secular society. Philanthropy alone cannot fill the gap left by government cutbacks. And the sources of altruism go deep into our evolutionary past.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: During the past few decades, modern technology, with radio, TV, air travel, and satellites, has woven a network of communication which puts each part of the world in to almost instant contact with all the other parts.
author: David Bohm

quote: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Men kick friendship around like a football, but it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it goes to pieces.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
author: George Eliot

quote: I think there is always a need for pure design. With pure design, you don't need so much decoration.
author: Jil Sander

quote: We do not know enough about how the present will lead into the future.
author: Gregory Bateson

quote: I've found that if you wear a beret, people think you're either a cabdriver or a producer of dirty movies.
author: Ernie Harwell

quote: I never let anyone pluck, including myself, unless my mom approves. She guards my eyebrows. She's like the eyebrow police!
author: Isabelle Fuhrman

quote: I didn't have a regular school experience and wanted a more abstract way of learning. I started exploring in lots of different creative ways. It gave me the opportunity to travel and play music, so it was good for me.
author: Brie Larson

quote: There is, so I believe, in the essence of everything, something that we cannot call learning. There is, my friend, only a knowledge - that is everywhere.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: I don't care whether people like me or dislike me. I'm not on earth to win a popularity contest. I'm here to be the best human being I possibly can be.
author: Tab Hunter

quote: Before I go to bed at night, I ice my face, because it closes your pores and makes a difference in the morning.
author: Jasmine Tookes

quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
author: Dick Clark

quote: But it's a journey and the sad thing is you only learn from experience, so as much as someone can tell you things, you have to go out there and make your own mistakes in order to learn.
author: Emma Watson

quote: He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery.
author: Wilson, Harold

quote: A life lesson for me is, how do you muster the courage to take on a new risk? Whether it's starting up a business or taking on a new project or expedition. I think the risks that we take are all relative to the risk-taker.
author: Ann Bancroft

quote: Of course, I'd like to produce and direct a blockbuster, but you gotta build up to that. So now I'm learning from a bunch of little movies. And it's more fun with smaller pictures. It's more creative.
author: Lea Thompson

quote: When my mother got home from work, she would take me to the movies. It was her way of getting out, and she would take me with her. I'd go home and act all the parts. It had a tremendous influence on my becoming an actor.
author: Al Pacino

quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: My dad is a nurse midwife, one of about only 50 male midwives in the U.S., I think.
author: Matthew Morrison

quote: In general, shorter is better. If you can encapsulate your idea into a single captivating sentence, you're halfway home.
author: Len Wein

quote: Small debts are like small shot they are rattling on every side, and can scarcely be escaped without a wound:great debts are like cannon of loud noise, but little danger.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: I think the institute of marriage is a noble thing. The idea of a partner for life is incredibly romantic. But now we're living to 100. A hundred years ago people were dying at age 37. Til death do us part was a much different deal.
author: Debra Messing

quote: Yesterday's the past, tomorrow's the future, but today is a gift. That's why it's called the present.
author: Bil Keane

quote: I love producing. I am loving doing that. I think that is my most natural space in the business. I just love producing or editing and that's where I thrive.
author: Will Smith

quote: If you can feed your family, give them an education, then you are a success.
author: Jami Gertz

quote: I was always interested in fashion and beauty. I was fifteen when I was scouted in a flea market. Two years later, I arrived in New York. I was in awe because it was like another planet.
author: Candice Swanepoel

quote: While we are focusing on fear, worry, or hate, it is not possible for us to be experiencing happiness, enthusiasm or love.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: First and foremost I am a drummer. After that, I'm other things... But I didn't play drums to make money.
author: Ringo Starr

quote: As soon as man enters into a state of society he loses the sense of his weakness equality ceases, and then commences the state of war.
author: Charles de Secondat

quote: Was it not enough punishment and suffering in history that we were uprooted and made helpless slaves not only in new colonial outposts but also domestically.
author: Robert Mugabe

quote: I have thought there was some advantage even in death, by which we mingle with the herd of common men.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don't be afraid to fail. Don't waste energy trying to cover up failure. Learn from your failures and go on to the next challenge. It's OK to fail. If you're not failing, you're not growing.
author: H. Stanley Judd

quote: When you have a family, or even when you're just seeing a girl, it's difficult to be skint.
author: Bill Nighy

quote: The attitude is we live and let live. This is actually an amazing change in values in a rather short time and it's an example of freedom from religion.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Your home should be your home. People shouldn't be allowed to use whatever crazy lenses they use to catch you waking up in the morning.
author: Sarah Chalke

quote: My philosophy of life is that if we make up our mind what we are going to make of our lives, then work hard toward that goal, we never lose - somehow we win out.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: One man alone can be pretty dumb sometimes, but for real bona fide stupidity, there ain't nothin' can beat teamwork.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: International business may conduct its operations with scraps of paper, but the ink it uses is human blood.
author: Ambler, Eric

quote: Not only our future economic soundness but the very soundness of our democratic institutions depends on the determination of our government to give employment to idle men.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: No one in this world has ever lost money by underestimating the intelligence of the great masses of the plain people. Nor has anyone ever lost public office thereby.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: When small men attempt great enterprises, they always end by reducing them to the level of their mediocrity.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: If you're bored with life - you don't get up every morning with a burning desire to do things - you don't have enough goals.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: The forgotten man... He works, he votes, generally he prays, but his chief business in life is to pay.
author: William Graham Sumner

quote: If you go away on location for three months and your wife stays at home, you've made a whole new load of friends and she's made a whole new load of friends and you get home and you're kind of strangers.
author: Michael Caine

quote: If you want to know why Republicans and conservatives are in a political crisis, you need only consider the fact that the Right's deeply held view now boils down to this:Taxes should not go up on the wealthy, and your health benefits should be cut.
author: John Podhoretz

quote: I think the number one thing Black women and all Black people should be paying attention to is our health.
author: Bell Hooks

quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
author: Epictetus

quote: The satirist shoots to kill while the humorist brings his prey back alive and eventually releases him again for another chance.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: As a kid, I'd go into the bathroom when I was having a tantrum. I'd be in the bathroom crying, studying myself in the mirror. I was preparing for future roles.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: A life of leisure and a life of laziness are two things. There will be sleeping enough in the grave.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: One of the great failings of our education system is that we tend to focus on those who are succeeding in exams, and there are plenty of them. But what we should also be looking at, and a lot more urgently, is those who fail.
author: Michael Morpurgo

quote: My knowledge of science came from being with Carl, not from formal academic training. Carl gave me a thrilling tutorial in science and math that lasted the 20 years we were together.
author: Ann Druyan

quote: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together.
author: Josh Billings

quote: I've had a lot of experience in independent film, and about how to choose. You've got to be very discerning about where you put your five bucks, and where you cut and what you don't cut.
author: Ethan Hawke

quote: Human history becomes more and more a race between education and catastrophe.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: I'm always trying to find brain food and indulge in knowledge that's gonna be useful.
author: Big Boi

quote: I was brought up in the modern world of all the luxury and the highlight of show business. I was born into a Christian home.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: I'm gonna be the best dad that ever lived. I'll have a ranch with a race car track and a golf course.
author: Jeremy London

quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you:love, prayer, and forgiveness.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: If this humor be the safety of our race, then it is due largely to the infusion into the American people of the Irish brain.
author: William Howard Taft

quote: Yes, Democrats can prove that America pays more for health care than other countries yes, they have won the dispute that private health insurance is needlessly expensive. But what they've lost is the argument that we are a society.
author: Thomas Frank

quote: History is an account, mostly false, of events, mostly unimportant, which are brought about by rulers, mostly knaves, and soldiers, mostly fools.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: That is the returning to God which in reality is never concluded on earth but yet leaves behind in the soul a divine home sickness, which never again ceases.
author: Max Muller

quote: My parents were French and Irish and our family even has Spanish blood-and I do so love the United States and consider myself part American.
author: Vivien Leigh

quote: Celebrity culture has gone crazy, and I think the reason is that real news is just not bearable, and it also seems impossible to change anything.
author: Chris Martin

quote: In the name of Hypocrites, doctors have invented the most exquisite form of torture ever known to man:survival.
author: Edward Everett Hale

quote: Old age realizes the dreams of youth:look at Dean Swift in his youth he built an asylum for the insane, in his old age he was himself an inmate.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the world.
author: John Evelyn

quote: We now accept the fact that learning is a lifelong process of keeping abreast of change. And the most pressing task is to teach people how to learn.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: The past is not dead, it is living in us, and will be alive in the future which we are now helping to make.
author: William Morris

quote: Religious speech is extreme, emotional, and motivational. It is anti-literal, relying on metaphor, allusion, and other rhetorical devices, and it assumes knowledge within a community of believers.
author: Amy Waldman

quote: So I got home, and the phone was ringing. I picked it up, and said 'Who's speaking please?' And a voice said 'You are.'
author: Tim Vine

quote: I love to fly. I always wanted to fly. It's been one of my dreams since I was 3 years old. I remember saying to my mom, 3 years old, every day, 'I can fly!' Living on the ninth floor, it was dangerous.
author: Elena Anaya

quote: Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality. Wake Up and Live!
author: Bob Marley

quote: He that communicates his secret to another makes himself that other's slave.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: The fact is there is forgiveness for those who seek God. And I believe in the power of redemption.
author: Rick Perry

quote: The extension of women's rights is the basic principle of all social progress.
author: Charles Fourier

quote: The question is what I wanted to do with the new life God has given me. This is the mission I want to take on.
author: Billy Tauzin

quote: I have a desire to create more film, more beauty, more art, more love, but I don't feel desperate. It's not about creating or building a career.
author: Lisa Bonet

quote: The man who has the will to undergo all labor may win to any good.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I'm glad about what's happening to the music business. This last crop of people we had in the 90s, who are going away now, they didn't like music. They didn't trust musicians. They wanted something else from it.
author: James Taylor

quote: Black History Month must be more than just a month of remembrance it should be a tribute to our history and reminder of the work that lies in the months and years ahead.
author: Marty Meehan

quote: The traveler was active he went strenuously in search of people, of adventure, of experience. The tourist is passive he expects interesting things to happen to him. He goes 'sight-seeing.'
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: I think the way IBM has embraced the open source philosophy has been quite astonishing, but gratifying. I hope they'll do very well with it.

quote: All I know is that history repeats itself and people are going to want to experience the world. But I know then they are going to have a better appreciation for what is here in Maine.

quote: A common mistake that people make when trying to design something completely foolproof is to underestimate the ingenuity of complete fools.

quote: Beauty is as summer fruits, which are easy to corrupt and cannot last; and for the most part it makes a dissolute youth, and an age a little out of countenance; but if it light well, it makes virtue shine and vice blush.

quote: Enhancing revenues will help us improve education and solve our infrastructure problems.

quote: I cannot love as I have loved,And yet I know not why;It is the one great woe of lifeTo feel all feeling die.

quote: It's so different when you change your hair color, you're treated so differently. It's a very funny experience. It's fun - I love changing up my hair.

quote: Yoga is a way to freedom. By its constant practice, we can free ourselves from fear, anguish and loneliness.

quote: There is no middle ground in Hollywood you're a failure or you're a success. That mentality is wild.

quote: I don't smoke, don't drink much, and go to the gym five times a week. I live a healthy lifestyle and feel great. I can run a marathon, you know.

quote: Teaching kids about health and fitness is important to me. It's about being fit for life.

author: Kim Weston

quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.

quote: Despise the enemy strategically, but take him seriously tactically.

quote: And Shanghai is amazing. I'm a fan of science fiction so when you're there in the night with all the lights and all this modernity, it's like a set in a movie.

quote: Okay, when you start to fight for equality, like Anand did in 1995, you could end up losing game 10, like he did, without putting up any kind of fight.
author: Vladimir Kramnik

quote: I'm more than open to hope, but I think men and women have a difficult time dealing with each other and often take the low road.

author: Willie Stargell

quote: I'd rather do a really good small part than a really bad big part.

author: Jef Raskin

quote: You know, for most seniors Medicare is their only form of health care.

quote: I don't think that a leader can control, to any great extent, his destiny. Very seldom can he step in and change the situation if the forces of history are running in another direction.
author: Richard M. Nixon

author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: We see our customers as invited guests to a party, and we are the hosts. It's our job every day to make every important aspect of the customer experience a little bit better.

quote: Never say never, but the thought of electively cutting oneself is beyond my grasp, and I also object to it politically. Denying the lines on our faces makes a comment about age and wisdom I don't care to make.

quote: My mom and dad played this music all the time when I was growing up, so to me songs by Jerry Lee and Fats Domino are the classics, they're the best songs ever.

quote: We tried to have diplomas without learning, we tried to have jobs without work, we tried to have houses without savings, we tried to have government without responsibility.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.

quote: I have dreamed in my life, dreams that have stayed with me ever after, and changed my ideas they have gone through and through me, like wine through water, and altered the color of my mind.
author: Emily Bronte

author: Kenneth G. Wilson

quote: We had our first earthquake over here recently. That was a bizarre feeling. I just became disoriented and I remember my dad freaking out. Nothing broke or anything.
author: Ashley Scott

quote: Wealth is a tool of freedom, but the pursuit of wealth is the way to slavery.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: I think most of the people involved in any art always secretly wonder whether they are really there because they're good or there because they're lucky.

quote: While 45 of the 50 States have either a State constitutional amendment or a statute that preserves the current definition of marriage, left-wing activist judges and officials at the local levels have struck down State laws protecting marriage.
author: John Boehner

quote: Certain kinds of speed, flow, intensity, density of attacks, density of interaction... Music that concentrates on those qualities is, I think, easier achieved by free improvisation between people sharing a common attitude, a common language.

quote: Faith, mighty faith, the promise sees, And looks to God alone Laughs at impossibilities, And cries it shall be done.
author: Charles Wesley

quote: The education that prepared me was my general education classes, which I tried to avoid when I was a stupid undergraduate, but which gave me the foundation of general knowledge that makes a career as a writer possible.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: I believe that the will of the people is resolved by a strong leadership. Even in a democratic society, events depend on a strong leadership with a strong power of persuasion, and not on the opinion of the masses.

quote: However, we do not lack anti-terrorist laws. I do not believe that the recent London bombs were the result of any deficiencies in our legal system.
author: Kenneth Clarke

quote: When I was in high school, I don't know that I really had big dreams.
author: Alan Jackson

quote: America's future will be determined by the home and the school. The child becomes largely what he is taught hence we must watch what we teach, and how we live.
author: Jane Addams

quote: There was great leadership in this country at the time of World War II. There was also unrelenting resolve at home, in America's factories and on the farms, in the cities and the country.

quote: A pencil and rubber are of more use to thought than a battalion of assistants. To happiness the same applies as to truth:one does not have it, but is in it.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: In the long history of the world, only a few generations have been granted the role of defending freedom in its hour of maximum danger. I do not shrink from this responsibility - I welcome it.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
author: Chanakya

quote: Real education should educate us out of self into something far finer into a selflessness which links us with all humanity.
author: Nancy Astor

quote: We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind. In the faith that looks through death, in years that bring the philosophic mind.
author: John Bacon

quote: I cannot remember a moment in my life when I have not felt the love of my family. We were a family that would have killed for each other - and we still are.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Experts tell us that 90% of all brain development occurs by the age of five. If we don't begin thinking about education in the early years, our children are at risk of falling behind by the time they start Kindergarten.

quote: One's work usually occupies more than half of one's waking life. Choosing work that does not bring happiness will lead to a life that is mostly disappointing.

quote: Yes, Americans can still get credit for cars and trucks and refrigerators, and those businesses are doing well. But just try to get a home loan now.

quote: No matter how close to yours another's steps have grown, in the end there is one dance you'll do alone.

quote: Well, you know what? The actor still gets up in the morning, if he's still got something to work with, you go out there and you do it. Never quit!

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.

quote: I asked my daughter when she was 16, What's the buzz on the street with the kids? She's going, to be honest, Dad, most of my friends aren't into Kiss. But they've all been told that it's the greatest show on Earth.

quote: My anger with the US was not at first, that they had used that weapon - although that anger came later.

quote: We've always loved going to the movies. Our mom and dad are big movie fans. They'd take us on these movie orgys where we'd see sometimes three movies in a day.

quote: If one morning I walked on top of the water across the Potomac River, the headline that afternoon would read:'President Can't Swim.'

quote: You can do anything you think you can. This knowledge is literally the gift of the gods, for through it you can solve every human problem. It should make of you an incurable optimist. It is the open door.

quote: Look within. Within is the fountain of good, and it will ever bubble up, if thou wilt ever dig.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life:Overcome fear, behold wonder.

quote: I never really got on that well with Yoko anyway. Strangely enough, I only started to get to know her after John's death.

quote: I think steak is the ultimate comfort food, and if you're going out for one, that isn't the time to scrimp on calories or quality.

quote: We will never fully explain the world by appealing to something outside it that must simply be accepted on faith, be it an unexplained God or an unexplained set of mathematical laws.
author: Paul Davies

quote: Many a man fails as an original thinker simply because his memory it too good.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: History has shown that one cannot legislate a culture of integrity. And yet, one of the paramount responsibilities and challenges of corporate leadership is to ensure such a culture.

quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.

quote: It is not a God, just and good, but a devil, under the name of God, that the Bible describes.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.

quote: The mountains, the forest, and the sea, render men savage they develop the fierce, but yet do not destroy the human.

quote: I think the fact that I was raised in show business, in New York City, in the '50s, that's affected my personality to the point that I'm a little different.

quote: I think it's important to get your surroundings as well as yourself into a positive state - meaning surround yourself with positive people, not the kind who are negative and jealous of everything you do.

quote: Young film makers should learn how to deal with the money and learn how to deal with the power structure. Because it is like a battle.

quote: We sleep, but the loom of life never stops, and the pattern which was weaving when the sun went down is weaving when it comes up in the morning.

quote: Definition of a Statistician:A man who believes figures don't lie, but admits than under analysis some of them won't stand up either.

quote: Design can never be an ultimate explanation for anything. It can only be a proximate explanation. A plane or a car is explained by a designer but that's because the designer himself, the engineer, is explained by natural selection.

quote: Of all that is written, I love only what a person has written with his own blood.

quote: We cannot change anything until we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses.

quote: To all the kids out there:Follow your dream. Believe in your dream. Because dreams do come true.

quote: For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance.

quote: In terms of my marriage, you know, falling in love with my husband was by far the best thing that's ever happened to me.

quote: The charm of history and its enigmatic lesson consist in the fact that, from age to age, nothing changes and yet everything is completely different.

quote: Well, I'm a libertarian conservative, so I believe in limited government/maximum individual freedom.

quote: My mom raised us three boys by herself on welfare. It's not worse than anybody else's life.

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.

quote: Even when they have nothing, the Irish emit a kind of happiness, a joy.

quote: That no government, so called, can reasonably be trusted, or reasonably be supposed to have honest purposes in view, any longer than it depends wholly upon voluntary support.

quote: Litigant. A person about to give up his skin for the hope of retaining his bones.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Access to computers and the Internet has become a basic need for education in our society.

quote: My dad is kind of a rascal, like in a Dickensian sense. He just goes from career to career.

quote: Fatherhood is the most amazing thing that could ever have happened in my life.

quote: Analogies, it is true, decide nothing, but they can make one feel more at home.

quote: That U.N. Security Council resolution requires getting Syrian troops and intelligence officials out of Lebanon so that the Lebanese can have elections here this spring that are free and fair and free of outside influence.

quote: Fall is my favorite season in Los Angeles, watching the birds change color and fall from the trees.

quote: Irish fiction is full of secrets, guilty pasts, divided identities. It is no wonder that there is such a rich tradition of Gothic writing in a nation so haunted by history.

quote: I never knew any Jews until I got into show business. I've found them to be real smart and good workers.

quote: I saw as a teacher how, if you take that spark of learning that those children have, and you ignite it, you can take a child from any background to a lifetime of creativity and accomplishment.

author: Henry Fielding

quote: Our intelligence community needs better coordination of operations and exchange of information, and that's why we need an overall director of national intelligence and a national counterterrorism center.

author: Arlen Specter

quote: Most small business owners are not particularly sophisticated business people. That's not a criticism they're passionate about cutting hair or cooking food, and that's why they got in the business, not because they have an MBA.

quote: The funny thing is the songs that people think are about me probably aren't. And the songs that are probably are the ones they wouldn't think... so that's where it kind of is funny.

quote: Equality, rightly understood as our founding fathers understood it, leads to liberty and to the emancipation of creative differences wrongly understood, as it has been so tragically in our time, it leads first to conformity and then to despotism.

quote: I love power. But it is as an artist that I love it. I love it as a musician loves his violin, to draw out its sounds and chords and harmonies.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I live by the philosophy that beauty starts from within, and I make a conscious effort to fill my body with nutrients through the food I eat.

quote: Once you become famous, there is nothing left to become but infamous.

quote: I like to believe that I've got a lot of guardian warriors sittin' on my shoulder including my dad.

quote: This is the highest wisdom that I own freedom and life are earned by those alone who conquer them each day anew.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I'm not sure that some of the food purists are in touch with what really goes on in American households.

quote: I didn't have a financial need, and I wasn't very gifted at relationships. I probably was more like what we think of boys as being:hard to pin down and wary of commitment.

quote: I'm looking forward to being a mom and a wife and a business owner.

quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Growing up with my family gave me some of my best memories. I'd like to have a family of my own - slip away for a bit and do nothing but spend those early years with my children.
author: Katherine Jenkins

quote: My wife's jealousy is getting ridiculous. The other day she looked at my calendar and wanted to know who May was.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: From tea parties to the election in Massachusetts, we are witnessing the single greatest political pushback in American history.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: Liturgy is like a strong tree whose beauty is derived from the continuous renewal of its leaves, but whose strength comes from the old trunk, with solid roots in the ground.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: I came from somewhat of a musical family. I had an uncle on Broadway. My dad kind of knows how to play instruments. Although, I always find it annoying when he does play an instrument.

quote: I guess I was a mom so late in life, my daughter was the greatest thing since sliced bread.
author: Candice Bergen

quote: But the reason I became, why I wanted to be in the business was because there was Midnight Cowboy.
author: Jodie Foster

quote: I have learned that only two things are necessary to keep one's wife happy. First, let her think she's having her own way. And second, let her have it.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: We Jews have a special attachment to the Book. The study of page after page in tomes yellowing with age was obligatory.
author: Theodore Bikel

quote: France, after the month of May, will share trust with the current leadership of the United States which, on many subjects, has tended to take useful positions in our view.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: I used to work a lot on food issues and every time somebody predicted that production would be inadequate they got egg on their face a year or two later.
author: Susan George

quote: Most of these people who are celebrities now don't do anything to deserve it, so by that fact alone, I don't want to be one.
author: will.i.am

quote: Our government has kept us in a perpetual state of fear - kept us in a continuous stampede of patriotic fervor - with the cry of grave national emergency.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: I've been gone for a long time. I really want to give the fans something that they deserve to have. So, I'm working really hard on this. I really want to make it the best work I've done so far.
author: Brandy Norwood

quote: My candle burns at both ends; it will not last the night; but ah, my foes, and oh, my friends - it gives a lovely light!
author: Millay, Edna Saint Vincent

quote: In Scotland, the indication is that for the Westminster elections at least, Labour voters are satisfied with their government.
author: Lucy Powell

quote: He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy.
author: Socrates

quote: I am not a pig farmer. The pigs had a great time, but I didn't make any money.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I have thought about it a great deal, and the more I think, the more certain I am that obedience is the gateway through which knowledge, yes, and love, too, enter the mind of the child.

quote: I'm overjoyed and beyond honored to be a part of the L'Oreal Paris family. I'm such a fan of L'Oreal Paris not just for all of their amazing products, but for what they stand for.

quote: I'm only wanted by directors for the image I give off, and it makes me angry. I always wanted to be an actor and not a beauty pageant winner.

quote: Courage is sometimes frail as hope is frail:a fragile shoot between two stones that grows brave toward the sun though warmth and brightness fail, striving and faith the only strength it knows.

quote: Every day I wake up and I lay in bed counting my blessings and saying my prayers for how fortunate I am to have great fans and health and family.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.

quote: No, no, I was only funny on stage, really. I, I, think I was funny as a person toward my classmates when I was very young. You know, when I was a child, up to about the age of 12.

quote: I'm sure I have a process, but it mostly takes place in my dreams.

quote: Most people have no concept of how an automatic transmission works, yet they know how to drive a car. You don't have to study physics to understand the laws of motion to drive a car. You don't have to understand any of this stuff to use Macintosh.

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

quote: Intuition and concepts constitute... the elements of all our knowledge, so that neither concepts without an intuition in some way corresponding to them, nor intuition without concepts, can yield knowledge.

quote: The concept of active cooperation has taken the place of opposition to the new form of government and of dreamy resignation entranced with the beauty of times past.

quote: Our judgments judge us, and nothing reveals us, exposes our weaknesses, more ingeniously than the attitude of pronouncing upon our fellows.

quote: I am a bit of a hopeless romantic. I really do have a faith and a belief in love, and when I love, I love hard.

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.

quote: I really don't like to do back-to-back movies. I concentrate on things at home. My family and school life are important to me. I try to do one movie a year.

quote: Men know they are sexual exiles. They wander the earth seeking satisfaction, craving and despising, never content. There is nothing in that anguished motion for women to envy.

quote: My mom was a dancer, my dad's a singer and I've always had that kind of music in my life.

quote: I watch and listen to movies today and am shocked by the way actors deliver their lines. Everybody mumbles now and I don't understand why.

quote: The attitude and capacity of the factory, the old metal table and the new ideas of the wooden furniture quickly and naturally suggested the possibility of metal furniture.

quote: The emotional, sexual, and psychological stereotyping of females begins when the doctor says:It's a girl.
author: Shirley Chisholm

quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.

quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.

quote: I have a hotline to the tabloids. When I get up in the morning, I call the Star, and the last thing at night, I call them. I want them to have the inside track.

quote: The right to be let alone is indeed the beginning of all freedoms.

quote: From secrecy and deception in high places, come home, America. From military spending so wasteful that it weakens our nation, come home, America.

quote: When, as we must often do, we fear science, we really fear ourselves.

quote: The ultimate purpose of religious life is to make this evolution move in a direction far more important to the destiny of the ego than the moral health of the social fabric which forms his present environment.

quote: You can only do your best. That's all you can do. And if it isn't good enough, it isn't good enough.

quote: There's no point in swanning through and being cool as a breeze in every scene. It's not really that interesting. Even if you're a superhero.

quote: The armored cars of dreams, contrived to let us do so many a dangerous thing.

quote: Deep Throat's information, and in my view, courage, allowed the newspaper to use what he knew and suspected.

quote: The Dalai Lama. He is a very wise man of great inner peace who believes that happiness is the purpose of our lives. Through his teachings and leadership, he continues to make this world a better place in which to live.

quote: The overwhelming majority of Americans are possessed of two great qualities a sense of humor and a sense of proportion.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: I never learn anything talking. I only learn things when I ask questions.

quote: Property may be destroyed and money may lose its purchasing power but, character, health, knowledge and good judgement will always be in demand under all conditions.

quote: How many deaf people do you know in real life? Unless they live in a cave, or are 14, which seems to be true for most people in this business, what could I possibly tell them that they don't already know?

quote: The gods conceal from men the happiness of death, that they may endure life.
author: Lucan

quote: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.

quote: The marvel of all history is the patience with which men and women submit to burdens unnecessarily laid upon them by their governments.
author: George Washington

quote: Experienced happiness refers to your feelings, to how happy you are as you live your life. In contrast, the satisfaction of the remembering self refers to your feelings when you think about your life.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: Optimism is not inherently a superior way of viewing the world. Certainly doctors will say it might be better for one's physical health to be an optimist. But, morally speaking it may not be appropriate in certain circumstances.

quote: If they had a social gospel in the days of the prodigal son, somebody would have given him a bed and a sandwich and he never would have gone home.

quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.

quote: Men shrink less from offending one who inspires love than one who inspires fear.

quote: People see my photos and think I labor over my image and I'm this cool, brooding artist. But I'm just having fun with it.

quote: The role of leadership is to transform the complex situation into small pieces and prioritize them.

quote: Marriage is not a noun it's a verb. It isn't something you get. It's something you do. It's the way you love your partner every day.

quote: Inside every adult there's still a child that lingers. We're happiness merchants - giving people the opportunity to dream like children.

quote: Growing up, I saw my dad do charity work for children with health issues. That had a profound effect on me.

quote: I think that some books are more successful than others to certain readers. People who read my books for the humor, they're going to love one book. People who read my books for the mystery, they might not like that book quite as much.

quote: We all recognize that in recent decades, many important achievements have helped create a cleaner, healthier environment, yet our national needs in environmental health are not being fully met.

quote: The rare few, who, early in life have rid themselves of the friendship of the many.

quote: There is something mean in human nature that prefers to think evil, that gives a willing ear and a ready welcome to calumny, a sort of jealousy of goodness and greatness and things of good report.

quote: Hell isn't merely paved with good intentions it's walled and roofed with them. Yes, and furnished too.

quote: I have often wondered how it is that every man loves himself more than all the rest of men, but yet sets less value on his own opinions of himself than on the opinions of others.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: The newspaper is a marvelous medium. It is extraordinarily convenient and cheap. Let's see. This one cost 75 cents. Now that's a little high. I bought it when I was downtown this morning.

quote: I would prefer to have no money but to have a nice family and good friends around.

quote: It's funny how many people will come to Vegas to see your show where they might not come out to see you unless you come to their hometown.

quote: Favor comes because for a brief moment in the great space of human change and progress some general human purpose finds in him a satisfactory embodiment.

quote: Anyone who has lost track of time when using a computer knows the propensity to dream, the urge to make dreams come true and the tendency to miss lunch.

quote: You learn far more from negative leadership than from positive leadership. Because you learn how not to do it. And, therefore, you learn how to do it.

quote: But I have found that in the simple act of living with hope, and in the daily effort to have a positive impact in the world, the days I do have are made all the more meaningful and precious. And for that I am grateful.

quote: I graduated a the top of my class in the '84 Olympic Games I won a gold medal.

quote: It won't take 40 years for opposition to same-sex marriage to dissipate.

quote: A bad man is the sort who weeps every time he speaks of a good woman.

quote: Anybody can be good in the country. There are no temptations there.

quote: Whoever undertakes to set himself up as a judge of Truth and Knowledge is shipwrecked by the laughter of the gods.

quote: When the show is over we still have to pay our rent, we have to buy food. We have to do all the same things that you do.

quote: A passion for politics stems usually from an insatiable need, either for power, or for friendship and adulation, or a combination of both.

quote: My idea of heaven is a great big baked potato and someone to share it with.

quote: Courage is the art of being the only one who knows you're scared to death.

quote: I could have been more famous if I did all the glitzy things, but celebrity always seemed so unnecessary.

quote: My greatest happiness is to serve my gracious King and Country and I am envious only of glory for if it be a sin to covet glory I am the most offending soul alive.

quote: Surround yourself with the best people you can find, delegate authority, and don't interfere as long as the policy you've decided upon is being carried out.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: However glorious an action in itself, it ought not to pass for great if it be not the effect of wisdom and intention.

quote: Just as the soul fills the body, so God fills the world. Just as the soul bears the body, so God endures the world. Just as the soul sees but is not seen, so God sees but is not seen. Just as the soul feeds the body, so God gives food to the world.

quote: If you don't change your beliefs, your life will be like this forever. Is that good news?

quote: My father was so good-natured and had such a happy disposition. I've always confused him with Jimmy Stewart. So, think Jimmy Stewart. That's my dad.

quote: I want to be more successful as a mother than I am in show business.

quote: No, my mom kind of led me toward acting. She wanted to be an actress when she was younger. That made me interested in it when I was a kid, because she and I are very close.

quote: The filth and noise of the crowded streets soon destroy the elasticity of health which belongs to the country boy.

quote: Everyone talks about age, but it's not about age. It's about work ethic. Winning never gets old.
author: Lisa Leslie

quote: Language is like money, without which specific relative values may well exist and be felt, but cannot be reduced to a common denominator.
author: George Santayana

quote: This nation is notorious for its ability to make or fake anything cheaply. 'Made-in-China' goods now fill homes around the world. But our giant country has a small problem. We can't manufacture the happiness of our people.

quote: Marriage is an Athenic weaving together of families, of two souls with their individual fates and destinies, of time and eternity - everyday life married to the timeless mysteries of the soul.

quote: I am a filmmaker. That is all I've ever been. You know, Martin Scorsese makes films about the mob. And I make movies about food.

quote: I dropped out of school for a semester, transferred to another college, switched to an art major, graduated, got married, and for a while worked as a graphic designer.
author: James Green Somerville

quote: Solitude gives birth to the original in us, to beauty unfamiliar and perilous - to poetry. But also, it gives birth to the opposite:to the perverse, the illicit, the absurd.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: The poor have to labour in the face of the majestic equality of the law, which forbids the rich as well as the poor to sleep under bridges, to beg in the streets, and to steal bread.
author: Anatole France

quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I grew up playing music and enjoying good food, friends and family in my own backyard.
author: Rodney Atkins

quote: Civil and political rights are critical, but not often the real problem for the destitute sick. My patients in Haiti can now vote but they can't get medical care or clean water.
author: Paul Farmer

quote: Measured in time of transport and communication, the whole round globe is now smaller than a small European country was a hundred years ago.
author: John Boyd Orr

quote: The advantages found in history seem to be of three kinds, as it amuses the fancy, as it improves the understanding, and as it strengthens virtue.
author: David Hume

quote: I'm trying to get in the habit of, you know, picking up a book and learning how to write my feelings down, not my feelings but my thoughts, about things, and hopefully I'll moving toward the writing and directing thing soon.

quote: There are whole precincts of voters in this country whose united intelligence does not equal that of one representative American woman.
author: Carrie Chapman Catt

quote: Mitt Romney will stop the attacks on job creators, encourage entrepreneurs to chase their dreams, and bring good jobs and a better future to all Americans.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: I've always wanted to be an actress, ever since I was a little girl. I always played the mom and I played my sister as the daughter. I wanted to be an actress on television and movies instead of just around the house.

quote: It's not so much what you learn about Mumbai, it's what you learn about yourself, really. It's a funny old hippie thing, but it's true as well. You find out a lot about yourself and your tolerance, and about your inclusiveness.

quote: Government is an evil it is only the thoughtlessness and vices of men that make it a necessary evil. When all men are good and wise, government will of itself decay.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: The fame that goes with wealth and beauty is fleeting and fragile intellectual superiority is a possession glorious and eternal.
author: Sallust

quote: If you believe in God, He will open the windows of heaven and pour blessings upon you.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: Rock and menopause do not mix. It is not good, it sucks and every day I fight it to the death, or, at the very least, not let it take me over.
author: Stevie Nicks

quote: My bar for being successful is being able to do movies that really mean something to me and being able to make a living off of that.
author: Channing Tatum

quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art.
author: Clara Schumann

quote: When he was born, I looked at my little boy and felt an unconditional love I never knew was inside me. As he grew, and I watched him stagger about, squeak his first words, and turn into a beautiful little boy, that feeling did not change.
author: Tony Parsons

quote: I think for voters what matters is the values that drive the government.
author: Theresa May

quote: Here once again education is crucial, it enables children to be become more aware of their rights and to exercise them in a respectful manner which helps them shape their own future.
author: Carol Bellamy

quote: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended-and not to take a hint when a hint isn't intended.
author: Robert Frost

quote: If you have autism in the family history, you still vaccinate. Delay it a bit, space them out.
author: Temple Grandin

quote: To Adam Paradise was home. To the good among his descendants home is paradise.
author: Augustus Hare

quote: Where I come from it was really unheard of to be at a party and someone says, 'What kind of music do you make?', and you say, 'Pop music.' You may as well have 'I'm not cool' stamped on your forehead.

author: Ed Koch

quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I hope to attend it as Japan needs to tell the world the lessons, knowledge and reflections learned from the nuclear crisis at the Fukushima No. 1 power plant.
author: Yoshihiko Noda

quote: All I can do is leave it in God's hands and hope that my fans feel where I'm coming from.

quote: I don't watch a huge amount of telly. I read a lot. I'm reading at the moment 'Freedom,' by Jonathan Franzen, a great big brick of a book, and I'm loving it.

quote: One advantage of marriage is that, when you fall out of love with him or he falls out of love with you, it keeps you together until you fall in again.
